abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column says shortage of homes in many areas of country is pushing up prices and creating bidding wars for some properties; first-time buyers face headwinds; home prices nationally climbed almost 7 percent in March from year-earlier; tips on house-hunting given.

headline.print_headline: Tips for House Hunting in a Seller’s Market
headline.main: Tips for House Hunting in a Seller’s Market

snippet: A scarcity of homes for sale is pushing up prices and making house hunting a challenge, especially at the entry level.
lead_paragraph: A scarcity of homes for sale is pushing up prices and making house hunting a challenge, especially at the entry level.
